commit message: upped the number of messages - 20 is never enough
Abandoning Android 1.5 for future versions of Campyre
Merge branch 'eighty-messages' of https://github.com/schacon/campyre into schacon-eighty-messages
First stab at adding a working preference screen, and an inaugural preference for number of messages per room
Removed any hint of non-SSL communication, and fixed login problem resulting from Campfire changing http status code responses as part of their attempt to become immune from Firesheep
